Question: This person subsequently said of Grossman, "He was kind of like a Colonel Tom Parker figure ..
Hints: This person has been described as one of the most influential figures of the 20th century, musically and culturally.
While in London, this person performed at several London folk clubs, including The Troubadour, Les Cousins, and Bunjies.
On May 29, 2012, President Obama awarded this person a Presidential Medal of Freedom in the White House.
